Articles.Title: Why I Like BDD
Articles.Preview: Behaviour Driven Development (BDD) was developed by Dan North and it is a evolution from Test Driven Development (TDD). It is a means of specifying how software will work that uses Ubiquitous Language that is familiar to Developers, Business Analysts and Product Owners. A lot of people have written a lot about what BDD is all about, in this blog I want to talk about why I like BDD and why I think you should use it.
